body_html: I believe Switch, Enter, etc. support resources, and you should not need the RefSwitch etc. versions. Also note that you'll need to use the TF_NewWhile/TF_FinishWhile methods to create while loops, which don't currently support creating Ref* ops anyway.
body_text: I believe Switch, Enter, etc. support resources, and you should not need the RefSwitch etc. versions. Also note that you'll need to use the TF_NewWhile/TF_FinishWhile methods to create while loops, which don't currently support creating Ref* ops anyway.
body: I believe Switch, Enter, etc. support resources, and you should not need the RefSwitch etc. versions. Also note that you'll need to use the TF_NewWhile/TF_FinishWhile methods to create while loops, which don't currently support creating Ref* ops anyway.
